name: The Red Hood (itch)
description:
The Red Hood is a horror game, based on "Little Red riding hood" folks.

The Red Hood is a first-person horror game, where the main character is lost in the woods and you are not alone, there is a serial killer with a wolf mask and your main goal is to avoid him.
The gameplay is simple you should choose the right path to avoid a serial killer with a wolf mask if you die you will start the game from the beginning, remember the right paths, and good luck.

Features:
*Atmospheric visual
*Unique Mechanic
*Emotional gameplay
